title: Understanding the AVERAGE Function
text: The AVERAGE function calculates the mean value of a set of numbers.

title: Identifying the Purpose
text: The primary purpose of the AVERAGE function is not to sum or count numbers.

title: Focus on Calculation
text: The AVERAGE function divides the sum of numbers by the count of numbers.

title: Eliminating Options
text: The AVERAGE function does not find the maximum value in a range.

hintAnswer: To find the average of a range of numbers
title: Choosing the Correct Answer
text: Select the option that describes finding the mean of numbers.
choices: To add up a range of numbers
To find the average of a range of numbers
To count the number of cells in a range
To find the maximum value in a range
